HEADER.Title: Run command given command via ssh for windows

SCRIPT.MSCRI:
: SET &ACTION_NAME# = "RunCommandAction"
! Build java arguments : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SONIC.PUB.INCLUDE.SSH_PREPARE_CMD@WIN
!Append action specific inputs to java args ! File content : SET &UC4RB_FILE_CONTENT# = &UC4RB_SSH_COMMAND# : SET &UC4RB_FILE_PATH# = &TEMP_FILE_PATH# : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SONIC.PUB.INCLUDE.CREATE_FILE
: SET &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING# =&UC4RB_FILE_PATH# : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SONIC.PUB.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_ARG_VALUE@WIN : SET &UC4RB_JAVA_CMD# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_JAVA_CMD#, " -cmdfile &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING#")
: SET &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING# =&UC4RB_OUTPUT_LOG# : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SONIC.PUB.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_ARG_VALUE@WIN : SET &UC4RB_JAVA_CMD# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_JAVA_CMD#, " -outfile &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING#")
: SET &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING# =&UC4RB_ERROR_LOG# : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SONIC.PUB.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_ARG_VALUE@WIN : SET &UC4RB_JAVA_CMD# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_JAVA_CMD#, " -errfile &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING#")
: SET &UC4RB_JAVA_CMD# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_JAVA_CMD#, " -flg &FLAG#")
: PRINT &UC4RB_JAVA_CMD# ! Invoking java binar &UC4RB_JAVA_CMD#
